name: postgresql-admin
description:
PhpPgAdmin is a web-based administration tool for PostgreSQL. It is perfect for PostgreSQL DBAs, newbies, and hosting services.

This DC/OS package is ready to be used alongside the DC/OS `postgresql` package. Other PostgreSQL servers may work, but haven't been tested.
preInstallNotes:
PostgreSQL Admin requires at least 0.1 CPU and 128MB of RAM.

WARNING: PostgreSQL Admin on DCOS is currently `EXPERIMENTAL`. There may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies.

This package will automatically connect to an existing DC/OS `postgresql` package through an automated Virtual IP.

This package is accessible through the DC/OS `Services` tab. It will also create an entry in the DC/OS external load balancer for accessing the UI from outside the cluster, by default in port `15432`. Access the UI at `http://your_DCOS_URL/services/PostgreSQLadmin` or at `http://your_public_node_ip:15432`.
postInstallNotes:
PostgreSQL Admin has been installed.

You can now access the UI at `http://your_DCOS_URL/services/PostgreSQLadmin` or at `http://your_public_node_ip:15432`

DC/OS PostgreSQL default Login: `admin@localhost`
Default password: `admin`
